item.title: Protected Natural Area location
item.description: Data import Imported a .pdf document from a mexican government website, splitted strings on “/n” and unlisted the items. Then detected the string “Página 50” to get to the page where the coordinates table begins. The document looks like below. ## [1] "GACETA" ## [2] " ÓRGANO DEL GOBIERNO DEL ESTADO DE VERACRUZ DE IGNACIO DE LA LLAVE" ## [3] " OFICIAL" ## [4] " DIRECTORA GENERAL DE LA EDITORA DE GOBIERNO" ## [5] " ELVIRA VALENTINA ARTEAGA VEGA" ## [6] " DIRECTORA DE LA GACETA OFICIAL" Data cleaning and wrangling Cleaned and wrangled the data using string trimming, detecting and replacing into a tidy format tibble.
